title: Jan. 6 Panel Has Evidence for Criminal Referral of Trump, but Splits on Sending - The New York Times
content:
1. Jan. 6 Panel Has Evidence for Criminal Referral of Trump, but Splits on Sending  The New York Times
  2. Will Trump face a criminal referral? See Liz Cheney's response  CNN
  3. Jan. 6 panel has enough evidence to refer Trump for criminal charges, Cheney says  NBC News
  4. Representatives say Jan. 6 committee has enough evidence to refer Donald Trump for criminal charges  12NewsNow
  5. Cheney rejects report of a dispute among Jan. 6 committee on criminal referral for Trump  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Despite concluding that it has enough evidence, the committee is concerned that making a referral to the Justice Department would backfire by politicizing the investigation into the Capitol riot.
